n = 172, example of complicated (gridPos == "X" && pos.horiz) || (dGridPos == "X" && dpos.horiz), leading to complicated findRowAddSignZ 
4- 5_6 8+ 13+ 15+ 20s 11_-25 2_26 27s 29- 31+ 42t 52t 7_53 33_-54 60t 63+ 43_-64 32_66 67+ 12_-73 65_74 78t 3_79 23_83 45_84 85s 86- 41_-88 44_-89 56_91 38_-92 93s 94t 96s 40_99 37_100 10_101 28_-102 17_103 24_104 106+ 46_-107 36_108 98_-110 113- 81_-114 50_115 72_117 118- 22_-119 82_120 59_-122 123- 9_124 51_126 39_127 71_128 130+ 47_131 132- 133t 14_135 121_136 62_-137 30_-138 109_-139 1_-140 141t 21_-142 57_143 129_-144 145s 69_-146 112_148 48_149 80_-151 34_-152 153t 155s 87_157 158t 76_-160 116_-161 58_162 90_-163 164t 165s 97_-166 167s 168s 19_-170 18_172 150_173 95_174 125_-175 75_176 134_-177 178s 171_-180 68_181 156_182 183t 111_-184 185s 49_186 159_-187 188s 70_-189 190- 55_191 35_-192 154_-193 105_-194 147_195 61_196 169_197 179_198 16_199 77_200
